name: Boomsticks
description:
Shooting waves of monsters might sound easy when you have unlimited ammo, but not when your gun explodes every 10 seconds!

Throw your gun away before it explodes to avoid damage, time it just right and explode the monsters with it. Pickup new guns to continue shooting and survive to the end.

Controls

WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim and Shoot
Space - Throw gun
ESC - Quit
M - Toggle music

Music by DeltaBreaker (https://opengameart.org/content/on-my-way-8-bit-loop)

Made in less than 3 days for Ludum Dare 51
